warning.title: FR Token Description
warning.tip1: FR Token (FAIR Reward Token) is the reward token of FAIR DAO, initial supply is 0.
warning.tip2: Ways to obtain FR tokens: Claim by staking FAIR tokens, up to 90 days of earnings can be claimed each time; Obtain by participating in FAIR DAO construction.
warning.tip3: FR Token is the only proof for exchanging FAIR DAO earnings. All DAO earnings will be transferred to FR contract, and you can only exchange DAO earnings by burning FR tokens.
